mapper.select: /* QUERY ID : getOrderProductOptions */ SELECT a.order_item_id 'orderItemId' ,a.seq 'seq' ,a.cart_or_order 'cartOrOrder' ,a.prod_id 'prodId' ,a.option_name 'optionName' ,a.option_value 'optionValue' ,a.customer_id 'customerId' ,a.seller_id 'sellerId' ,a.addtional_price 'addtionalPrice' ,a.create_datetime 'createDatetime' ,a.modify_datetime 'modifyDatetime' ,a.creator 'creator' FROM order_product_option a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.order_item_id = #{orderItemId} AND a.seq = #{seq} AND UPPER(a.cart_or_order) = UPPER(#{cartOrOrder}) AND a.prod_id = #{prodId} AND UPPER(a.option_name) = TRIM(UPPER(#{optionName})) AND UPPER(a.option_value) = TRIM(UPPER(#{optionValue})) AND UPPER(a.customer_id) = UPPER(#{customerId}) AND UPPER(a.seller_id) = UPPER(#{sellerId}) AND a.addtional_price = TRIM(#{addtionalPrice}) AND UPPER(a.creator) = UPPER(#{creator}) ORDER BY a.seq ASC LIMIT #{pagenationPage}, #{pagenationPageSize}

/* QUERY ID : getTotalCntOrderProductOptions */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM order_product_option a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.order_item_id = #{orderItemId} AND a.seq = #{seq} AND UPPER(a.cart_or_order) = UPPER(#{cartOrOrder}) AND a.prod_id = #{prodId} AND UPPER(a.option_name) = TRIM(UPPER(#{optionName})) AND UPPER(a.option_value) = TRIM(UPPER(#{optionValue})) AND UPPER(a.customer_id) = UPPER(#{customerId}) AND UPPER(a.seller_id) = UPPER(#{sellerId}) AND a.addtional_price = TRIM(#{addtionalPrice}) AND UPPER(a.creator) = UPPER(#{creator})
/* QUERY ID : nextSeq */ SELECT CASE WHEN max(seq) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE (max(seq) + 1) END FROM order_product_option WHERE order_item_id = #{orderItemId}
mapper.update: /* QUERY ID : modifyOrderProductOptionForNotNull */ UPDATE order_product_option SET modify_datetime = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , cart_or_order = TRIM(UPPER(#{cartOrOrder})) ,prod_id = #{prodId} , option_name = TRIM(#{optionName}) , option_value = TRIM(#{optionValue}) , customer_id = TRIM(#{customerId}) , seller_id = TRIM(#{sellerId}) , addtional_price = TRIM(#{addtionalPrice}) WHERE order_item_id = #{orderItemId} AND seq = #{seq}
mapper.delete: /* QUERY ID : deleteOrderProductOption */ DELETE FROM order_product_option WHERE 1 = 1 AND order_item_id = TRIM(#{orderItemId}) AND UPPER(cart_or_order) = TRIM(UPPER(#{cartOrOrder})) AND prod_id = #{prodId} AND option_name = TRIM(#{optionName}) AND option_value = TRIM(#{optionValue}) AND customer_id = TRIM(#{customerId}) AND seller_id = TRIM(#{sellerId})
